editions.effect: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, %whenever%if% damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.

name: Veiling Breeze

result_editions.effect: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, %whenever%if% damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.
result_editions.effect_raw: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.
result_editions.effect_html: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, whenever if damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'whenever damage would be dealt to your champion' -> 'if damage would be dealt to your champion'
Veiling Breeze counts the amount of wind cards revealed during resolution. It does not care about the amount of wind cards in your memory after it has resolved.

effect_html: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.
